task.createtreadmill.use_treadmill.desc: The maid will use nearby treadmills
createtreadmill.ponder.treadmill_run.tex: Normally, only players can stand on it and run forward to power the treadmill.
玩家可以用拴绳将生物带到跑步机上
但是，它们可能不太愿意……
createtreadmill.ponder.treadmill_fly.tex: The stress on this treadmill is reversed...
So creatures standing on it will be thrown off.
I won't actually move the entity... Let's pretend a villager got launched.
createtreadmill.ponder.treadmill_speedup: When an entity on the treadmill is attacked, the treadmill speeds up for one minute (double speed, non-stackable).
但我相信，跑步机上的生物会更想逃脱
createtreadmill.ponder.treadmill_maid.te: If you have Touhou Maid Mod installed, you can assign the 'Treadmill' task to maids, allowing them to operate the treadmill.
Of course, the previous mechanics still apply normally...
而且女仆不会轻易逃脱……
advancement.createtreadmill.run_to_die.d: 让一个生物在跑步机上累死（你真残忍……）
